messages.title: My Priorities for EDINBURGH EAST
messages.content: To stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum. To hold the SNP to account for its failure to deliver the new sick kids hospital - now many years overdue. To secure more investment in vital local transport infrastructure and improvements to local roads. To defend the constituency from overdevelopment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.

To secure more investment in vital local transport infrastructure and improvements to local roads.
To defend the constituency from overdevelopment.
